titleStmt.title: Mensalia sacra, or, Meditations on the Lord's Supper wherein the nature of the holy sacrament is explain'd and the most weighty cases of conscience about it are resolv'd / by the reverend Mr. Francis Crow, late minister of the Gospel at Clare in Suffolk ; to which is prefixt a brief account of the author's life and death.
titleStmt.author: Crow, Francis, d. 1692.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
